H0.text: What was the name of the eponymous 'Knight of the Holy Grail' in an opera by Wagner. Parsifal

H1.text: What was the name of the eponymous 'Knight of the Holy Grail' in an opera by Wagner. Lohengrin

H2.text: What was the name of the eponymous 'Knight of the Holy Grail' in an opera by Wagner. Titurel

H3.text: What was the name of the eponymous 'Knight of the Holy Grail' in an opera by Wagner. Kundry

A4.text: Parsifal replaces Amfortas in his kingly office and orders to unveil the Grail, which is never to be hidden again.

A5.text: Parsifal (WWV 111) is a music drama in three acts by the German composer Richard Wagner and his last composition.
